TextBlock.Text: BASIL: A strange spacecraft seemingly Nomai in origin entered the system some time ago.
BASIL: More interestingly, shortly after the small "vessel" entered the cluster, a wooden-seeming ship, creator species unknown, entered the cluster.
BASIL: Using my telescope I was able to get a better view of the pilots of these crafts.
BASIL: The Nomai, suit indicative of Neem's clan, linked the Central Station's warp pad to their own in their ship.
BASIL: The other, species unknown, seems to be a four-eyed blue alien. Perhaps more investigation is in order?
